title: New Feature Update!
content: We're excited to announce the release of a new feature that makes the app faster and more intuitive. Check it out now!

title: Maintenance Downtime
content: The app will undergo scheduled maintenance on January 20th, 2025, from 2 AM to 5 AM. Please plan accordingly. We apologize for any inconvenience.

title: Thank You for Your Support!
content: Thank you for using our app and supporting our journey. Stay tuned for more exciting updates in the future!
